abstract: tiffany haddish is new groupon spokesperson , will star in super bowl ad .
article: girls trip actress tiffany haddish is finally becoming the spokesperson for her favorite online service , groupon . tiffany haddish is new groupon spokespersonthe star revealed her passion for the website on jimmy kimmel live ! and is known for encouraging fellow a-listers to use the site . `` nobody knows groupon like i know groupon , '' haddish has said . `` i 've been speaking out for them for years . in fact , i should have already been their spokesperson . i 've invested lots of money into buying groupon deals , and it 's about time i got an even bigger return on my investment than just saving money at my favorite local businesses . ''

the company even admitted that haddish ranks in the top 1 % of the most frequent purchasers on groupon . `` we 're thrilled to have one of the hottest names in entertainment as our new spokesperson , '' said groupon chief marketing officer vinayak hegde . `` tiffany 's award-winning talent and well-known passion for our brand make her the perfect choice to serve as the face of groupon . '' haddish will appear in a series of groupon ads on television , with the first coming during the fourth quarter of the super bowl on feb. . 4 .

the 30-second ad will be the first super bowl commercial the company has had in seven years . haddish made the announcement of her new spokeswoman position in a video published by groupon . see it below . source : uinterviewthe post tiffany haddish is new groupon spokesperson , will star in super bowl ad appeared first on uinterview .
